user_query: My family is planning a vacation to Hawaii and we need driving directions from the airport to our hotel. Can you provide us with the best route, including the estimated travel time, distance, and any potential traffic alerts or jams along the way? We would also like to autocomplete the names of popular tourist attractions on the island.

TaskList.description: Obtain driving directions from the airport to the hotel, including estimated travel time and distance.
Check for potential traffic alerts or jams on the route obtained in subtask 1.
Autocomplete names of popular tourist attractions on the island of Hawaii.
